snippet: Rebels crept into houses and attacked civilians, killing at least 30 people around the eastern town of Beni, the mayor, Nyonyi Bwana Kawa, said Thursday.
abstract: Nyonyi Bwana Kawa, mayor of Beni, Democratic Republic of Congo, says rebels crept into houses and attacked civilians, killing at least 30 people around the eastern town.
lead_paragraph: Rebels crept into houses and attacked civilians, killing at least 30 people around the eastern town of Beni, the mayor, Nyonyi Bwana Kawa, said Thursday.

headline.main: Democratic Republic of Congo: Rebels Attack Town
headline.print_headline: Democratic Republic of Congo: Rebels Attack Town
